    • Method Detail

      • sseek

        public static int sseek(java.lang.String tag,
        int offset,
        int whence)
        Seek within a seplib file.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag (or name), e.g. "in", for the seplib input file.
        offset - amount to move
        whence - and from where (SEEK_SET=0, SEEK_CUR=1, SEEK_END=2)
        Returns:
        The new offset of the underlying seek pointer

      • sseek_block

        public static int sseek_block(java.lang.String tag,
              int offset,
              int blocksize,
              int whence)
        Seek within a seplib file.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag (or name), e.g. "in", for the seplib input file.
        offset - number of blocks to move
        blocksize - unit size for seek
        whence - and from where (SEEK_SET=0, SEEK_CUR=1, SEEK_END=2)
        Returns:
        The new offset in multiples of blocksize of the underlying seek pointer

      • sseek_block_d

        public static double sseek_block_d(java.lang.String tag,
                   int offset,
                   int blocksize,
                   int whence)
        Seek within a seplib file.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag (or name), e.g. "in", for the seplib input file.
        offset - number of blocks to move
        blocksize - unit size for seek
        whence - and from where (SEEK_SET=0, SEEK_CUR=1, SEEK_END=2)
        Returns:
        The new offset in multiples of blocksize of the underlying seek pointer

      • file_position

        public static int file_position(java.lang.String tag,
                int blocksize,
                int[] blocks,
                int[] remainder)
        Report position within a seplib file.
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag (or name), e.g. "in", for the seplib input file.
        blocksize - Unit size for seek
        blocks - Number of full blocks to current file position
        remainder - Number of bytes past last full block to current file position
        Returns:
        ierr 0 on success, 1 if block_size > MAX_INT, -1 on I/O failure

      • sseekable

        public static int sseekable(java.lang.String tag)
        Report if seplib file is seekable
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag (or name), e.g. "in", for the seplib input file.
        Returns:
        0 if seekable, 1 if not seekable (yes, odd choices)
